name: Orange Turkey Brine
author: TIMP132
summary: Adding this twist to your Thanksgiving turkey will 'ooh' and 'aah' your guests.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
directions: Combine the orange juice concentrate, orange slices, lemon slices, lime slices, thyme, pepper, garlic, bay leaves, salt, and water in a large stockpot; bring to a boil
Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature
Make sure you have removed the innards
Place the turkey, breast down, into the brine
Make sure that the cavity gets filled
Place the bucket in the refrigerator
Allow turkey to marinate 1 to 2 days before cooking
Drain and discard the excess brine and pat dry
Cook the turkey as desired reserving the drippings for gravy
Keep in mind that brined turkeys cook 20 to 30 minutes faster
